擏擏擏

擏字的基本解释

擏
qíng
古同“擎”，举。
古同“檠”，矫正弓的器具：“擏不正，而可以正弓。”

擏
jǐng
古同“儆”，戒，警戒。

擏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］
［《廣韻》渠京切，平庚，羣。］
(1)同“擎”。
(2)通“檠”。矫正弓的工具。
￥￥2［jǐng］
［《集韻》舉影切，上梗，見。］
同“儆1”。
警戒。

擏字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擏； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页458第18
【集韻】渠京切，本作擎。　又【正韻】與檠通。輔正弓弩器。【荀子·性惡篇】良弓不得排擏，則不能自正。　又【集韻】【韻會】舉影切【正韻】居影切，?音景。戒也。與儆通。亦與檠通。【揚子·法言】見弓之張兮，何謂也，曰：擏之而已。

擏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
擏字的起名意思

古同“儆”，戒，警戒。

Smash
Basic explanation of words
Smash
qíng
Gu Tong "Qing", lift.
Gu Tong's "Bao", a tool for correcting bows: "If you are not correcting, you can bow straight."
Smash
jǐng
Gu Tong "warned", warned, and vigilant.
Smash
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］
["Guangyun" Qu Jingqie, Ping Geng, Qun. ]
(1) Same as "engine".
(2) Through "Bao". Tools for correcting bows.
￥￥2［jǐng］
["Ji Yun" cuts the shadows, the upper stem, see you. ]
Same as "儆1".
alert.
Smash
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　擏; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Pages 458 to 18
[Ji Yun] Qu Jing cut, this is the engine.　 [Zheng Yun] and Tong Tong. Auxiliary crossbow device. 【Xunzi·Evil Sex】A good bow can't be arrogant, it can't be self-righteous.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Juying and cutting [Zhengyun] Living in the shadow,? Soundscape. Quit also. And confidant. Also connected with barley. [Yangtze·Fayan] Seeing Zhang Xi of the bow, what is it, saying: It's nothing more than chasing.
